trash.name: meat
trash.notes: Although meat is a food product, it can't be composted :(

trash.name: coffee grounds
trash.notes: They make your compost smell better too :)

trash.name: toilet paper roll
trash.notes: Flatten the roll to make it take up less space in your recycling box

trash.name: envelope with plastic window
trash.notes: Most  of the 'plastic' windows are actually made of a material that can be recycled along with the paper!
